title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 8189.7 - Blocks
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 8189.7 - Blocks

State Regulations

On each section map, groups of parcels of property bounded by
streets, highways, waterways or other prominent features shall be designated as
blocks. Each such block shall be given an identifying number which shall be
marked on the map within the boundaries of the block. Any block shall not
contain more than 99 lots. When a modular section is divided by a city, town or
village boundary line, separate unique block numbers must be assigned within
the modular section to each city, town and village. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
8189.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
